name: BBQ Quesadilla
author: Anonymous
summary: These zesty quesadillas are filled with hot sausage, spicy barbecue sauce and cheese. Served with sour cream and salsa, they're great for lunch or a satisfying snack.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) package Bob Evans® Zesty Hot Sausage
½ cup thinly sliced red onion
½ cup Bob Evans® Wildfire BBQ Sauce
directions: In skillet over medium heat crumble and cook sausage and onions until brown
Lay 2 of the tortillas on a flat surface
Divide sausage mixture between the two
Heat large skillet over medium heat
Add a small amount of oil to coat bottom of skillet
Cook one quesadilla at a time until golden brown on each side, about 2 to 3 minutes per side
Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa
